properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM CONSULT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_ID = ?

SELECT CONSULT_NO , USER_NO , CONSULT_TITLE , CONSULT_CONTENT , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , CONSULT_ANSWER , ANSWER_DATE , STATUS , ORIGIN_NAME , FILE_PATH , CONSULT_CATEGORY , RESPONDENTS FROM CONSULT C JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) WHERE USER_ID = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
